title: The Guilt No One Talks About After Moving Abroad
description: This video delves into the often-unspoken emotional challenges and guilt experienced by individuals who move abroad, highlighting the bittersweet reality of building a new life while navigating changing relationships with their original home and family. Despite the difficulties and the feeling of constantly missing something, the participants ultimately affirm the personal growth and happiness found in pursuing their ambitions away from home.

title: The Pros and Cons of Living in Berlin
description: This video offers a comprehensive look at the pros and cons of living in Berlin, covering aspects like its liveliness, affordability, public transit, and vibrant art scene, while also addressing downsides such as cleanliness and high taxes.

title: What's Life Like as a Foreigner in Germany?
description: This video explores the experiences of foreigners living in Germany, with interviewees from various countries sharing their perspectives on life. Many highlight the professional opportunities, sense of safety, and international environment as positives, while also mentioning challenges such as the language barrier, bureaucracy, and cultural differences

title: Being a South African Expat Living in Germany
description: Matilda, a South African expat in Germany, shares her experiences living in Berlin, discussing the challenges of racism and culture shock she faced. Despite these difficulties, she has found a sense of home in Berlin, appreciates the public transportation, and has used her journey to explore her identity as an author and activist

title: Is Berlin Right for You? Expats Advice on Who Should Move Here
description: Whether you're an artist, a career-focused professional or entrepreneur, a queer or alternative person willing to express himself, or just curious about the Berlin lifestyle, these street interviews provide valuable insights into what life is really like in the German capital.

title: Expat Life in Germany (Challenges & Tips)
description: This video features Rodrigo Catao sharing his experiences and insights on expat life in Berlin. He discusses challenges such as language barriers and bureaucracy, offers tips for foreigners moving to Germany, and touches upon the impact of Brexit on the country's job market and expat community
